attributes.action: to consider funding for lesbian, gay, and immigrant groups by a 2p tax on the Daily Mail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The representation of Gay, lesbian and immigrant groups are members within our society that require special groups to promote their importance. Because the Daily Mail are supporters of these deserving groups it is proposed that a 2p tax be considered on the Daily Mail.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
